ActionXml:
<ActionList>
  <Desc>Save as Draft</Desc>
  <AppData
    InPutParm="Parm1">
    <col
      req="true">Title</col>
    <col
      req="true">Path</col>
    <col
      req="true">Icon</col>
    <col>Order</col>
    <col>UserAccessRoles</col>
  </AppData>
</ActionList>

<ActionList>
  <Desc>Current user in UserAccessRoles</Desc>
  <Select
    history="true"
    attachment="true">*</Select>
  <Where>
    <DataComarison
      Field="UserAccessRoles"
      Operation="InCurrenUserOrGroup"
      UserRolesToCheck="All Users,Admin" />
  </Where>
</ActionList>

WhenXml:
<ActionList>
  <Desc>Id: Parm1</Desc>
  <Select
    history="true"
    attachment="true">*</Select>
  <Where>
    <And>
      <DataComarison
        Field="Id"
        Operation="Eq"
        ValueParm="Parm1" />
      <DataComarison
        Field="UserAccessRoles"
        Operation="InCurrenUserOrGroup"
        UserRolesToCheck="All Users,Admin" />
    </And>
  </Where>
</ActionList>
